# msc-button

A Stencil component that is a simple wrapper for a [Material Button](https://material.io/develop/web/components/button/) .


## Style

The Material Button uses the `--mdc-theme-primary` variable to determine the
colour.  To change the colour of a button, simply override this CSS variable.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                                               | Type      | Default |
| ------------ | ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `dense`      | `dense`      | Style the button with slightly smaller text and container.                                                                                | `boolean` | `false` |
| `disabled`   | `disabled`   | Prevent the button from being clicked.                                                                                                    | `boolean` | `false` |
| `icon`       | `icon`       | The name of the icon to use with the button.  Name must be that of the [Material Icons](https://material.io/tools/icons/?style=baseline). | `string`  | `''`    |
| `label`      | `label`      | The label text to display on the button.                                                                                                  | `string`  | `''`    |
| `outlined`   | `outlined`   | Style the button with an outline.                                                                                                         | `boolean` | `false` |
| `raised`     | `raised`     | Styles the button such that it appears to be raised off the surface it is on.                                                             | `boolean` | `false` |
| `trailing`   | `trailing`   | A flag indicating if the icon comes after the label.                                                                                      | `boolean` | `false` |
| `unelevated` | `unelevated` | Style the button such that it appears to be flush with the surface it is on.                                                              | `boolean` | `false` |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
